channel.description: Recent content on Personal Blog — Software Engineering & Physics

item.title: Making an idea real: a short project template
item.description: This is a starter note I keep for new projects. It lists the quick steps I follow to move an idea from concept to a minimal, testable product.

item.title: Lijemutu
item.description: I am a software engineer with a BSc in Physics. I build products, experiment with business ideas, and publish technical writeups and project updates here. Welcome — explore my projects and get in touch.
